messageBody:
My standard way is to have it in the try catch clause. This is a test
method in a TestCase.

public AggregatedValidationException testSave() {
AggregatedValidationException result = null;
try {
assetStore.saveChanges();
} catch (AggregatedValidationExceptionObject e) {
result = e;
} catch (java.lang.Exception e) {
fail("Should have received AggregatedValidationException
received " + e);
}
if (result == null) {
fail("Should have received an exception");
}
return result;
}

Hope that helps

Christian
